data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Andrej Kramaric gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hoffenheim.
In the minute 7, Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Daniel Schlager awards Leipzig a goal kick.
Daniel Schlager signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Daniel Schlager signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Leipzig's half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Hoffenheim needs to be cautious. Leipzig have an attacking throw-in.
Daniel Schlager signals a throw-in for Leipzig, close to Hoffenheim's area.
In the minute 18, In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Throw-in for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 23, Kasim Nuhu (Hoffenheim) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 24, The match at PreZero Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marcel Sabitzer, who is down injured.
Leipzig advance rapidly upfield but Daniel Schlager blows for offside.
Marcel Sabitzer returns to the field for Leipzig after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 27, Hoffenheim's Munas Dabbur gets in a shot on goal at PreZero Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Leipzig at PreZero Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Leipzig.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leipzig are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick Leipzig.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Daniel Schlager will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Daniel Schlager signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of Leipzig.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcel Halstenberg is replacing Nordi Mukiele for the away team.
Justin Kluivert is on a sub for Emil Forsberg for Leipzig.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 50, Kevin Vogt (Hoffenheim) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Attention is being given to Leipzigâ€™s Ibrahima Konate and play has been suspended briefly.
Leipzig's Ibrahima Konate looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Leipzig.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Schlager waits before resuming play because Christoph Baumgartner for Hoffenheim is still down.
In the minute 55, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Christoph Baumgartner is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Leipzig at PreZero Arena.
In the minute 56, In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Ryan Sessegnon (Hoffenheim) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 57, Leipzig to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sinsheim to check on Kevin Vogt, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 60, Yussuf Poulsen is on target to give Leipzig a 0-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Marcel Sabitzer.
Leipzig make their third substitution with Alexander Sorloth replacing Ibrahima Konate.
In the minute 62, Hoffenheim's Kevin Vogt is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Leipzig drive upfield and Marcel Sabitzer gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hoffenheim defender.
In the minute 63, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Dayot Upamecano of Leipzig smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Throw-in Leipzig.
The home team have replaced Sebastian Rudy with Mijat Gacinovic. This is the first substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
In the minute 66, Ishak Belfodil is replacing Munas Dabbur for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Hoffenheim drives forward and Ishak Belfodil gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kevin Akpoguma.
In the minute 70, Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Kevin Akpoguma is back on the pitch.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 73, In Sinsheim, Christoph Baumgartner (Hoffenheim) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Sinsheim.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Leipzig at PreZero Arena.
Julian Nagelsmann is making the team's fourth substitution at PreZero Arena with Tyler Adams replacing Marcel Sabitzer.
The away team replace Justin Kluivert with Amadou Haidara.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Leipzig capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Leipzig are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Daniel Schlager signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Leipzig's half.
In the minute 80, Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Hoffenheim are caught offside.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) is making a third substitution, with Ihlas Bebou replacing Robert Skov.
In the minute 81, Free kick Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 87, Hoffenheim push upfield but Daniel Schlager quickly pulls them for offside.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Hoffenheim.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Daniel Schlager blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
The home team replace Ryan Sessegnon with Maximilian Beier.
Alexander Sorloth is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
